group.query: declare @r varchar(32); if @action = 'New' select @r = @@unit else begin select @r = rtrim(ma_dvcs) from dmts where so_the_ts = @value; select @r = isnull(@r, @@unit) end; select @r as value
declare @r varchar(32); if @action = 'New' select @r = @@unit else begin select @r = rtrim(ma_dvcs) from dmcc where so_the_ts = @value; select @r = isnull(@r, @@unit) end; select @r as value
declare @r varchar(32); if @action = 'New' select @r = @@unit else begin select @r = rtrim(ma_dvcs) from dmccdc where ma_dc = @value; select @r = isnull(@r, @@unit) end; select @r as value
